title: Innodisk expands edge AI applications and intelligent solution at Computex 2024 with new brand strategy
summary: Innodisk, a leading AI solution provider, is showcasing its latest advancements in edge AI at Computex 2024. The company is highlighting new products such as CXL 2.0 memory expansion, E3.S SSD, and MIPI over Type-C camera technology, along with demonstrations of smart manufacturing and intelligent people tracking solutions. Innodisk's new brand vision, 'Architect Intelligence', emphasizes its commitment to building intelligent solutions with global partners.
product_or_process: CXL 2.0 memory expansion, E3.S SSD, MIPI over Type-C camera technology, InnoTracking, PPE recognition solution, iCAP Air air quality management solution

title: Innodisk unveils edge AI applications and intelligent solution at Computex 2024 with new brand strategy
summary: Innodisk, a global AI solution provider, is showcasing its new edge AI products and solutions at Computex 2024. Their focus includes CXL 2.0 memory expansion, E3.S SSD, and MIPI over Type-C technology for machine vision, all aimed at advancing smart manufacturing and industrial applications. Innodisk is also introducing their new brand vision, "Architect Intelligence," emphasizing their commitment to building intelligent solutions with global partners.
